traits.description: Reduces all damage taken by you and your pets by 20%.
traits.name: Jungle Fortitude
traits.simpleDescription: To be one with the jungle is to take what you need and endure what you must.

traits.description: Your Plague of Toads, Corpse Spiders, Locust Swarm and Firebats abilities do 20% more damage.
traits.name: Vermin
traits.simpleDescription: "You think the creatures a nuisance, but they are legion and you are alone. What will you say when they come for you?" —Seera the Weaver

traits.description: Whenever an enemy dies within 12 yards there is a 5% chance that a zombie dog will automatically emerge. The range of this effect is increased by items that increase your gold pickup radius.
traits.name: Circle of Life
traits.simpleDescription: "The heads hanging in the village had their eyes sewn shut with thick thread. Whatever wicked magic held the frightful hound-beasts together was considerably stronger." —Abner Lockridge

traits.description:
Maximum Mana is increased by 20%. Regenerate 1% of your maximum Mana per second.

Mana is the fuel you use to cast offensive and defensive skills.
traits.name: Spiritual Attunement
traits.simpleDescription: "The pool is deep and still, cool and silent. Now a fountain, now a whirlpool. Drink and be renewed." —Runic carvings on the Shallow Stone

traits.description: Whenever you are healed by a health globe gain 10% of your maximum Mana and 10% Intelligence for 10 seconds. The Intelligence bonus can stack up to 5 times
traits.name: Gruesome Feast
traits.simpleDescription: "We are all connected in life and in death. Partake of the spirits of the dead and flourish like the jungle that grows wild after the fire." —Shadewalker Zunimassa

traits.description: 15% of Mana costs are paid with Life. In addition, you regenerate 1% of your maximum Life per second.
traits.name: Blood Ritual
traits.simpleDescription: "To give of one's self... Is there any greater gift?" —Final words spoken at the Ritual of Blood

traits.description: Whenever you deal Poison damage to an enemy, their damage is reduced by 20% for 3 seconds.
traits.name: Bad Medicine
traits.simpleDescription: "Their mastery of paralytic agents is astounding. The jungle, they say, provides ample demonstration of its wonders." —Abner Lockridge

traits.description: You can have 4 Zombie Dogs out at once. The health of your Zombie Dogs and Gargantuan is increased by 20%.
traits.name: Zombie Handler
traits.simpleDescription: The dead are willing minions. Death to them is not unknown, therefore need not be feared.

traits.description: All of your damage is increased by 20% but your Mana costs are increased by 30%.
traits.name: Pierce the Veil
traits.simpleDescription: "The spirits take their toll. Best to be ready to pay." —Shadewalker Zunimassa

traits.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Horrify, Spirit Walk and Soul Harvest spells by 2 seconds. In addition, the next time you receive fatal damage you automatically enter the Spirit Realm for 3 seconds and heal to 10% of your maximum Life. This effect cannot occur more than once every 90 seconds.
traits.name: Spirit Vessel
traits.simpleDescription: Everyone dies. Sometimes we must return to finish what we started.

traits.description: Whenever you cast a Physical Realm spell you have a 3% chance to summon a dagger-wielding Fetish to fight by your side for 60 seconds.
traits.name: Fetish Sycophants
traits.simpleDescription: The denizens of the Unformed Land are mischievous and drawn to power, always seeking to intrude upon our world, but too fickle to stay for long.

traits.description:
Spirit spells return 30% of their Mana cost over 10 seconds.

Spirit spells are:
Haunt
Horrify
Mass Confusion
Soul Harvest
Spirit Barrage
Spirit Walk
traits.name: Rush of Essence
traits.simpleDescription: All spirits must move onward if they wish to return to their origins. There is no going back.

traits.description: Anytime you have 4 or more skills on cooldown your Mana regeneration is increased by 300%.
traits.name: Vision Quest
traits.simpleDescription: "You sense but do not see. Walk beside yourself in the Unformed Land. Walk until you find yourself again, or wander lost forever." —Chant of Ordeal

traits.description: All your pets get 100% of the benefit of your Thorns and Life regeneration items.
traits.name: Fierce Loyalty

traits.description: Reduce damage taken by 50% whenever you are below 25% of your maximum Life.
traits.name: Death Trance
traits.simpleDescription: A soul anchored in this world will not easily drift to the next.

traits.description: Whenever an enemy dies within 8 yards, regain 1% of your maximum Life and Mana and the cooldown on all of your abilities is reduced by 1 second. This range is extended by items that increase your gold pickup radius.
traits.name: Grave Injustice
traits.simpleDescription: Only a fool tries to cheat death. The wise offer a fair trade.

traits.description: The cooldowns of your Fetish Army, Big Bad Voodoo and Hex abilities are reduced by 25%.
traits.name: Tribal Rites
traits.simpleDescription: "Befriend those who come from the Unformed Land, and they will befriend you." —Zuwadza of the Tribe of the Five Hills

runes.name: Splinters
runes.description: Shoot 3 darts at once that deal 70% weapon damage as Poison each.
runes.simpleDescription: Shoot multiple darts at the same target.

runes.name: Numbing Dart
runes.description: Toxins in the dart cause the target to move slower by 60% for 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Toxins in the dart Slow the target.

runes.name: Spined Dart
runes.description: Gain 9 Mana every time a dart hits a target.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain Mana for every target hits.

runes.name: Flaming Dart
runes.description: Ignite the dart, allowing it to deal a full 195% weapon damage as Fire at once.
runes.simpleDescription: Ignite the dart and deal Fire damage.

runes.name: Snake to the Face
runes.description: Transform your dart into a snake that has a 35% chance to stun the target for 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Transform your dart into a snake that has a chance to Stun the target.

skills.name: Poison Dart
skills.description:
Cost: 24 Mana

Shoot a deadly poison dart that deals 100% weapon damage as Poison and an additional 80% weapon damage as Poison over 2 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 24 Mana

Shoot a deadly poison dart.

Hold SHIFT to attack without moving.

runes.name: Groping Eels
runes.description: Increases the damage done to 52% weapon damage per second as Physical.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the damage of Grasp of the Dead.

runes.name: Unbreakable Grasp
runes.description: Increase the slow amount to 80%.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the amount Grasp of the Dead Slows enemies.

runes.name: Rain of Corpses
runes.description: Corpses fall from the sky dealing 25% weapon damage as Physical to nearby enemies.
runes.simpleDescription: Corpses fall from the sky, damaging enemies they fall on.

runes.name: Desperate Grasp
runes.description: Reduces the cooldown to 6 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduces the cooldown of Grasp of the Dead.

runes.name: Death is Life
runes.description: Enemies who die while in the area of Grasp of the Dead have a 5% chance to produce a health globe.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies killed while in Grasp of the Dead sometimes produce health globes.

skills.name: Grasp of the Dead
skills.description:
Cost: 75 Mana
Cooldown: 8 seconds

Hands reach out from the ground slowing enemy movement by 60% and dealing 40% weapon damage as Physical for 8 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 75 Mana
Cooldown: 8 seconds

Summon ghoulish hands from the ground that slow and entangle enemies.

runes.name: Leaping Spiders
runes.description: Summon jumping spiders that leap up to 25 yards to reach their target and attack for 30% weapon damage as Physical.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon jumping spiders to attack your target.

runes.name: Spider Queen
runes.description: You may only have one Spider Queen summoned at a time.
runes.simpleDescription: You may only have one Spider Queen summoned at a time.

runes.name: Widowmakers
runes.description: Summon widowmaker spiders that return 4 Mana to you per hit.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon widowmaker spiders that regenerate Mana each time they attack.

runes.name: Medusa Spiders
runes.description: Summon paralyzing spiders that have a 25% chance to slow enemies' movement by 60% with every attack.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon paralyzing spiders that have a chance to Slow enemies with every attack.

runes.name: Blazing Spiders
runes.description: Summon fire spiders that deal 32% weapon damage as Fire.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon Fire spiders that burn targets.

skills.name: Corpse Spiders
skills.description:
Cost: 48 Mana

Summon 4 spiders to attack nearby enemies for 25% weapon damage as Physical.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 48 Mana

Throw a jar of Corpse Spiders that attack nearby enemies before dying.

Hold SHIFT to attack without moving.

runes.name: Life Link
runes.description: 10% of damage done to you is absorbed by your zombie dogs instead.
runes.simpleDescription: Zombie Dogs absorb damage you take.

runes.name: Rabid Dogs
runes.description: Your summoned zombie dogs gain an infectious bite that deals 9% of your weapon damage over 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Your summoned Zombie Dogs gain an infectious bite that poisons targets.

runes.name: Final Gift
runes.description: Upon death, your Zombie Dogs have a 15% chance of leaving behind a health globe.
runes.simpleDescription: Upon death, your Zombie Dogs have a chance of leaving a health globe.

runes.name: Burning Dogs
runes.description: Light your dogs on fire allowing them to burn nearby enemies for 2% of your weapon damage as Fire.
runes.simpleDescription: Light your dogs on fire allowing them to burn nearby enemies.

runes.name: Leeching Beasts
runes.description: Your Zombie Dogs gain 50% of damage dealt as Life, half of which heals you.
runes.simpleDescription: Your Zombie Dogs gain Life as they attack, half of which heals you as well.

skills.name: Summon Zombie Dogs
skills.description:
Cost: 30 Mana
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Summon 3 zombie dogs from the depths to fight by your side. Each dog deals 9% of your weapon damage as Physical per hit.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 30 Mana
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Summon 3 zombie dogs to fight by your side.

runes.name: Explosive Toads
runes.description: Mutate to Fire bullfrogs that explode for 169% weapon damage as Fire.
runes.simpleDescription: Mutate to Fire bullfrogs that explode on impact.

runes.name: Toad of Hugeness
runes.description: This rune adds a 5 second cooldown to the skill.
runes.simpleDescription: This rune adds a 5 second cooldown to the skill.

runes.name: Toad Affinity
runes.description: Removes the Mana cost of Plague of Toads.
runes.simpleDescription: Removes the Mana cost of Plague of Toads.

runes.name: Addling Toads
runes.description: Mutate to yellow frogs that deal 130% weapon damage as Poison and confuse affected enemies for 4 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Mutate to yellow frogs that Poison and Confuse enemies.

runes.name: Rain of Toads
runes.description: Hail a rain of toads down from the sky that deals 100% weapon damage per second as Poison to enemies in the area for 2 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Cause toads to rain down from the sky and Poison enemies they strike.

skills.name: Plague of Toads
skills.description:
Cost: 21 Mana

Release a handful of toads that deal 130% weapon damage as Poison to enemies they come in contact with.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 21 Mana

Conjure toads that explode on contact.

Hold SHIFT to attack without moving.

runes.name: Hedge Magic
runes.description: The Fetish Shaman will periodically heal friendly targets for 3559 Life.
runes.simpleDescription: The Fetish Shaman will periodically heal allies.

runes.name: Jinx
runes.description: Targets transformed by Hex take 24% additional damage.
runes.simpleDescription: Targets transformed by Hex take additional damage.

runes.name: Angry Chicken
runes.description: Transform into an angry chicken for up to 5 seconds that can explode for 215% weapon damage as Physical to all enemies within 12 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: Transform into an angry chicken that can explode.

runes.name: Painful Transformation
runes.description: Hex causes the target to Bleed for 12% weapon damage as Physical.
runes.simpleDescription: Hex causes transformed targets to Bleed and take damage.

runes.name: Unstable Form
runes.description: Hexed targets explode when killed dealing 135% weapon damage as Poison to all enemies within 8 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: Hexed targets explode when killed.

skills.name: Hex
skills.description:
Cost: 30 Mana
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Summon a Fetish Shaman for 8 seconds that will hex enemies into chickens. Hexed enemies are unable to perform offensive actions and take 12% additional damage.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 30 Mana
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Summon a Fetish Shaman that transforms enemies into chickens.

runes.name: Consuming Spirit
runes.description: The spirit returns 297 Life per second.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain Life as long as your Spirit damages an enemy.

runes.name: Resentful Spirit
runes.description: Modifies the spirit to do 0% weapon damage as Arcane over 0 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon a vengeful Spirit that ravages its target.

runes.name: Lingering Spirit
runes.description: If there are no targets left the spirit will linger for up to 10 seconds looking for new targets.
runes.simpleDescription: If there are no targets for Haunt, the Spirit lingers looking for new targets.

runes.name: Grasping Spirit
runes.description: Slows the movement of haunted targets by 30%.
runes.simpleDescription: Slows the movement of haunted targets.

runes.name: Draining Spirit
runes.description: The spirit returns 2.0 Mana per second.
runes.simpleDescription: Haunt regenerates your Mana.

skills.name: Haunt
skills.description:
Cost: 15 Mana

Haunt an enemy with a spirit dealing 350% weapon damage as Arcane over 15 seconds. If the target dies, the spirit will automatically haunt another nearby enemy.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 15 Mana

Command a spirit to haunt an enemy. If the target dies, the spirit haunts another victim.

An enemy can only be affected by one Haunt at a time.

runes.name: Phobia
runes.description: Increases the duration of the fear to 6 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the Fear duration of Horrify.

runes.name: Stalker
runes.description: Gain 20% increased movement speed for 4 seconds after cast.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain increased movement speed after casting Horrify.

runes.name: Face of Death
runes.description: Increases the radius of the effect to 24 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the radius of Horrify.

runes.name: Frightening Aspect
runes.description: Gain 100% additional armor for 8 seconds after casting Horrify.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain additional Armor after casting Horrify.

runes.name: Ruthless Terror
runes.description: Gain 16 Mana for every feared enemy.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain Mana for every enemy under the effect of Horrify.

skills.name: Horrify
skills.description:
Cost: 22 Mana
Cooldown: 20 seconds

Don a spectral mask that horrifies all enemies within 12 yards, causing them to run in fear for 4 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 22 Mana
Cooldown: 20 seconds

Channel the horrors of the Unformed Land and frighten nearby enemies.

runes.name: Fire Pit
runes.description: The explosion creates a pool of fire that deals 12% weapon damage per second as Fire for 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: The explosion creates a pool of fire that lingers for a limited time.

runes.name: Flash Fire
runes.description: Rather than exploding for area damage, each Firebomb can bounce to up to 6 additional targets. Damage is reduced by 15% per bounce.
runes.simpleDescription: Rather than exploding, the skull bounces between multple targets.

runes.name: Roll the Bones
runes.description: Allows the skull to bounce up to 2 times.
runes.simpleDescription: The skull bounces, dealing damage on every bounce.

runes.name: Pyrogeist
runes.description: Create a column of flame that spews fire at the closest enemy for 170% weapon damage as Fire over 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Create a column of flame that spews fire at the closest enemy.

runes.name: Conflagration
runes.description: In addition to the base explosion, create a larger blast that deals an additional 35% weapon damage as Fire to all enemies within 28 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: A secondary explosion increases the impact area of Firebomb.

skills.name: Firebomb
skills.description:
Cost: 24 Mana

Lob an explosive skull that deals 100% weapon damage as Fire to all enemies within 8 yards.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 24 Mana

Throw a possessed skull that explodes on impact.

Hold SHIFT to attack without moving.

runes.name: Dire Bats
runes.description: Summon fewer but larger bats that travel up to 40 yards and hit for 170% weapon damage as Fire.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon larger dire bats that travel further, damaging anything in their path.

runes.name: Vampire Bats
runes.description: 2.5% of damage done by the bats is gained as Life.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain Life whenever the bats damage enemies.

runes.name: Plague Bats
runes.description: Diseased bats fly towards the enemy and infect them. Damage is slow at first, but can increase over time to a maximum of 150% weapon damage as Poison.
runes.simpleDescription: Diseased bats fly towards the enemy and infect them.

runes.name: Hungry Bats
runes.description: Rapidly summon bats to seek out nearby targets for 200% weapon damage per second as Fire.
runes.simpleDescription: Release bats that seek out nearby targets and engulf them in flames.

runes.name: Cloud of Bats
runes.description: Call forth a swirl of bats to damage nearby enemies for 130% weapon damage as Fire. The damage of the bats increases by 10% every second, up to a maximum of 50%.
runes.simpleDescription: The bats flock around you, damaging enemies that get too close.

skills.name: Firebats
skills.description:
Cost: 27 Mana

A swarm of fiery bats burn enemies in front of you for 100% weapon damage as Fire.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 27 Mana

Call forth a swarm of fiery bats.

Hold SHIFT to attack without moving.

runes.name: Leperous Zombie
runes.description: The charger leaves behind a cloud of noxious vapors that deals 20% weapon damage per second as Poison to enemies caught in it.
runes.simpleDescription: The charger leaves behind a cloud of noxious vapors that Poisons enemies caught in it.

runes.name: Undeath
runes.description: If the Zombie Charger kills any enemies it will reanimate and charge nearby enemies for 205% weapon damage as Poison. This effect can repeat up to 2 times.
runes.simpleDescription: If the Zombie Charger kills any enemies it will be reanimated to charge again.

runes.name: Wave of Zombies
runes.description: Summon 3 zombie chargers that each deal 72% weapon damage as Poison.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon additional Zombie Chargers.

runes.name: Explosive Beast
runes.description: Summon an explosive zombie dog that deals 266% weapon damage as Fire to all enemies within 9 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon an explosive Zombie Dog that streaks towards its target before exploding in a fiery blast.

runes.name: Zombie Bears
runes.description: Summon zombie bears that stampede towards your target. Each one deals 236% weapon damage as Poison to enemies in the area.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon zombie bears that stampede towards your target.

skills.name: Zombie Charger
skills.description:
Cost: 86 Mana

Call forth a reckless, suicidal zombie that deals 205% weapon damage as Poison to all enemies in its way.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 86 Mana

Raise a zombie that charges enemies in its path before decomposing.

runes.name: Jaunt
runes.description: Increases the duration of Spirit Walk to 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the duration of Spirit Walk.

runes.name: Honored Guest
runes.description: Gain 15% of your maximum Mana every second while Spirit Walk is active.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain Mana every second while Spirit Walk is active.

runes.name: Umbral Shock
runes.description: When Spirit Walk ends, your doppleganger erupts for 85% weapon damage as Fire to all enemies within 10 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: When Spirit Walk ends, your doppleganger erupts into flames and damages nearby enemies.

runes.name: Severance
runes.description: Enemies you walk through in spirit form take 100% weapon damage as Physical.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies you walk through in spirit form take damage.

runes.name: Healing Journey
runes.description: Gain 10% of your maximum Life every second while Spirit Walk is active.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain Life every second while Spirit Walk is active.

skills.name: Spirit Walk
skills.description:
Cost: 30 Mana
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Enter the spirit realm for 2 seconds. While in the spirit realm, your movement is unhindered.

Your link to the spirit realm will end if you cast any spell or your physical body sustains 50% of your maximum Life in damage.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 30 Mana
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Summon a doppelganger and enter the Spirit Realm to move faster past enemies.

runes.name: The Spirit is Willing
runes.description: Gain 27 Mana every time Spirit Barrage hits.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain Mana every time a Spirit Barrage hits.

runes.name: Well of Souls
runes.description: Fire an additional 3 spirits that seek out other targets and deal 25% weapon damage as Physical.
runes.simpleDescription: Additional spirits seek out and damage nearby enemies.

runes.name: Phantasm
runes.description: Summons a spectre for 5 seconds that deals 40% weapon damage as Physical to all enemies within 10 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: Summons a spectre that deals damage to nearby enemies.

runes.name: Phlebotomize
runes.description: Regain 3% of damage dealt as Life.
runes.simpleDescription: Regain Life when using Spirit Barrage.

runes.name: Manitou
runes.description: Summons a spectre for 20 seconds that hovers over you conjuring spirit bolts at nearby enemies for 46% weapon damage as Physical.
runes.simpleDescription: Summons a spectre that hovers over you and attacks enemies.

skills.name: Spirit Barrage
skills.description:
Cost: 66 Mana

Bombard a target with a spirit blast that deals 215% weapon damage as Physical.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 66 Mana

Unleash a spirit blast that can travel long distances and over some obstacles.

runes.name: Humongoid
runes.description: Gargantuan gains a Cleave ability allowing its attacks to hit multiple targets for 32% of your weapon damage as Physical.
runes.simpleDescription: The Gargantuan gains the Cleave ability, allowing it to attack multiple targets.

runes.name: Restless Giant
runes.description:
20% movement speed
35% attack speed
200% physical damage

This effect cannot occur more than once every 120 seconds. Elite enemies include Champions, Rares, Bosses and other players.
runes.simpleDescription: Elite enemies include Champions, Rares, Bosses and other players.

runes.name: Wrathful Protector
runes.description: The Gargantuan only lasts 15 seconds but is also more powerful. The Gargantuan's fists burn with fire, dealing an additional 55% of your weapon damage as Fire and knocking enemies back with every hit.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon a more powerful Gargantuan for a shorter amount of time.

runes.name: Big Stinker
runes.description: A poison cloud surrounds the Gargantuan, dealing 15% of your weapon damage per second as Poison to nearby enemies.
runes.simpleDescription: A Poison cloud surrounds the Gargantuan damaging nearby enemies.

runes.name: Bruiser
runes.description: The Gargantuan gains the ability to the periodically slam enemies, dealing 100% of your weapon damage as Physical and stunning them for 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: The Gargantuan gains the ability to Stun enemies.

skills.name: Gargantuan
skills.description:
Cost: 90 Mana
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Summon a large zombie follower to fight for you. The Gargantuan attacks for 25% of your weapon damage as Physical damage with every swing.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 90 Mana
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Summon a gargantuan zombie monstrosity to fight for you.

runes.name: Pestilence
runes.description: The locust swarm has a 25% chance to jump to two targets instead of one.
runes.simpleDescription: The locust swarm has a chance to spread to addional targets.

runes.name: Devouring Swarm
runes.description: Gain 10 Mana for every enemy affected.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain Mana for every enemy affected by the swarm.

runes.name: Diseased Swarm
runes.description: Enemies killed by the Locust Swarm leave behind a cloud of locusts that deal 25% weapon damage as Poison. This cloud of locusts lingers for 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies killed by the Locust Swarm leave behind a cloud of locusts that attack enemies that enter it.

runes.name: Cloud of Insects
runes.description: Increase the duration of the swarm to 4 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the duration of the swarm.

runes.name: Searing Locusts
runes.description: Engulf the target with burning locusts that deal 234% weapon damage as Fire over 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Engulf the target with burning locusts.

skills.name: Locust Swarm
skills.description:
Cost: 75 Mana

Summon a plague of locusts to assault enemies, dealing 180% weapon damage as Poison over 3 seconds. The locusts will jump to additional nearby targets.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 75 Mana

Unleash a plague of locusts that swarm multiple targets.

Hold SHIFT to attack without moving

runes.name: Black Blood
runes.description: Ichor errupts from the corpses of the Zombie Dogs that slows enemies by 60% for 8 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Ichor errupts from the corpses of the Zombie Dogs that Slows enemies.

runes.name: Next of Kin
runes.description: Each sacrificed dog has a 35% chance to resurrect as a new zombie dog.
runes.simpleDescription: Each sacrificed dog has a chance to resurrect as a new Zombie Dog.

runes.name: Pride
runes.description: Recover 180 Mana for each sacrificed dog.
runes.simpleDescription: Regain Mana for each sacrificed dog.

runes.name: For the Master
runes.description: Gain 11862 Life for each sacrificed dog.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain Life for each sacrificed dog.

runes.name: Provoke the Pack
runes.description: Increase all damage done by 5% for every sacrificed dog for 30 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the damage done when you sacrifice your Zombie Dogs.

skills.name: Sacrifice
skills.description: All of your zombie dogs explode, each dealing 200% of your weapon damage as Physical to all enemies within 12 yards.
skills.simpleDescription:
Banish your Zombie Dogs causing them to explode.

Only summoned zombie dogs can be sacrificed.

runes.name: Acid Rain
runes.description: The initial splash is increased to 24 yards.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the area of effect of Acid Cloud.

runes.name: Lob Blob Bomb
runes.description: The acid on the ground forms into a slime that irradiates nearby enemies for 25% weapon damage as Poison. The slime will survive for 5 seconds before dissipating.
runes.simpleDescription: The acid on the ground forms into a slime that Poisons nearby enemies before dissipating.

runes.name: Slow Burn
runes.description: Increases the duration of the acid pools to 6 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the duration of the acid pools.

runes.name: Kiss of Death
runes.description: Spit a cloud of acid that inflict 138% weapon damage as Poison, followed by 28% weapon damage as Poison to enemies who remain in the area.
runes.simpleDescription: Spit a cloud of acid that inflicts Poison damage to enemies who remain in the area.

runes.name: Corpse Bomb
runes.description: A corpse emerges from the ground and explodes for 266% weapon damage as Poison to enemies in the area.
runes.simpleDescription: A corpse emerges from the ground and explodes, damaging enemies in the area.

skills.name: Acid Cloud
skills.description:
Cost: 120 Mana

Acid rains down dealing an initial 125% weapon damage as Poison, followed by 25% weapon damage as Poison to enemies who remain in the area for 3seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 120 Mana

Cause acid to rain down and leave pools of poison.

runes.name: Swallow Your Soul
runes.description: Gain 24 Mana for every affected enemy.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain Mana for every affected enemy.

runes.name: Siphon
runes.description: Gain 4152 Life for every affected enemy.
runes.simpleDescription: Gain Life for every affected enemy.

runes.name: Languish
runes.description: Reduces the movement speed of enemies by 60% for 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduce the movement speed of affected enemies.

runes.name: Soul to Waste
runes.description: Increases duration of the effect to 60 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases duration of Soul Harvest.

runes.name: Vengeful Spirit
runes.description: Affected enemies also take 70% weapon damage as Physical.
runes.simpleDescription: Affected enemies also take damage.

skills.name: Soul Harvest
skills.description:
Cost: 36 Mana
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Feed on the life force of up to 5 nearby enemies within 15 yards. Gain 130 Intelligence for each affected enemy. This effect lasts 30 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 36 Mana
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Feed on the life force of enemies to increase your Intelligence for 30 seconds.

runes.name: Jungle Drums
runes.description: Increases the duration of the ritual to 30 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Increases the duration of the ritual.

runes.name: Rain Dance
runes.description: Recover 75 Mana per second while standing in the ritual area.
runes.simpleDescription: Recover Mana while standing in the ritual area.

runes.name: Slam Dance
runes.description: Increase the damage of all allies in the area by 30%.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the damage of all allies in the area.

runes.name: Ghost Trance
runes.description: Heal all allies in the area for 5% of their maximum Life per second.
runes.simpleDescription: Heal all allies in the area.

runes.name: Boogie Man
runes.description: Enemies who die in the ritual area have a 50% chance to resurrect as a zombie dog.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies who die in the ritual area have a chance to resurrect as a Zombie Dog.

skills.name: Big Bad Voodoo
skills.description:
Cooldown: 120 seconds

Summon a Fetish to begin a ritual dance that increases the attack speed and movement speed of all allies in the area by 20% for 20 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 120 seconds

Conjure a Fetish to increase the attack speed of all allies.

runes.name: Unstable Realm
runes.description: Cooldown reduced to 45 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Reduce the Cooldown of Mass Confussion.

runes.name: Devolution
runes.description: Targets killed while confused have a 50% chance of spawning a zombie dog.
runes.simpleDescription: Targets killed while Confused have a chance of spawning a Zombie Dog.

runes.name: Mass Hysteria
runes.description: Up to 6 monsters who aren't confused will be stunned for 3 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies not Confused become Stunned instead.

runes.name: Paranoia
runes.description: All enemies in the area take 20% additional damage for 12 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Enemies affected by Mass Confusion take additional damage.

runes.name: Mass Hallucination
runes.description: Amid the confusion, a giant spirit rampages through enemies, dealing 22% weapon damage per second as Physical to enemies it passes through.
runes.simpleDescription: Amid the confusion, a giant spirit rampages through enemies dealing, damage in the process.

skills.name: Mass Confusion
skills.description:
Cost: 45 Mana
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Incite paranoia in enemies, causing some to fight for you for 12 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 45 Mana
Cooldown: 60 seconds

Incite Confusion in enemies, causing some to fight for you for 12 seconds.

runes.name: Barricade
runes.description: Increase the width of the zombie wall. The line of zombies will attack for 42% weapon damage per second as Physical.
runes.simpleDescription: Increase the width of the zombie wall.

runes.name: Unrelenting Grip
runes.description: Zombies will slow the movement of enemies by 60% for 5 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Zombies will Slow the movement of enemies.

runes.name: Creepers
runes.description: Up to 3 zombies will emerge entirely from the ground and attack nearby enemies for 26% of your weapon damage as Physical per swing.
runes.simpleDescription: Additional zombie crawlers emerge from the ground and move to attack nearby enemies.

runes.name: Pile On
runes.description: Summon a tower of zombies falls over dealing 800% weapon damage as Physical to any enemies in the way and knocks them back.
runes.simpleDescription: Summon a tower of zombies that fall over and deal damage.

runes.name: Dead Rush
runes.description: Zombies run out in all directions dealing 475% weapon damage as Physical to nearby enemies.
runes.simpleDescription: Zombies crawl out of the the ground and run in all directions, damaging enemies they cross.

skills.name: Wall of Zombies
skills.description:
Cost: 63 Mana
Cooldown: 25 seconds

A line of zombies emerges from the ground, attacking nearby enemies for 84% weapon damage as Physical for 5 seconds.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cost: 63 Mana
Cooldown: 25 seconds

Raise a horde of zombies from the ground that attacks nearby enemies.

runes.name: Fetish Ambush
runes.description: Each Fetish deals 250% weapon damage as Physical to any enemy near it as they appear.
runes.simpleDescription: Each Fetish deals additional damage when it spawns.

runes.name: Devoted Following
runes.description: Decreases the cooldown to 90 seconds.
runes.simpleDescription: Decreases the cooldown duration of Fetish Army.

runes.name: Legion of Daggers
runes.description: Adds 3 dagger-wielders to the army.
runes.simpleDescription: Add additional Fetishes to the army.

runes.name: Tiki Torchers
runes.description: Adds 2 Fetish casters to the army. The casters breathe fire that deals 15% of your weapon damage as Fire in a cone in front of them.
runes.simpleDescription: Add Fetish casters to the army. The casters breathe fire that damage enemies.

runes.name: Head Hunters
runes.description: Adds 2 Hunter Fetishes to the army. Hunter Fetishes shoot blowdarts at enemies dealing 20% of your weapon damage as Poison.
runes.simpleDescription: Add Hunter Fetishes to the army. Hunter Fetishes shoot blowdarts at enemies.

skills.name: Fetish Army
skills.description:
Cooldown: 120 seconds

Summon an army of Fetish creatures to fight by your side for 20 seconds. Dagger-wielding Fetishes attack for 20% of your weapon damage as Physical.
skills.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 120 seconds

Summon an army of dagger-wielding Fetishes.
